name: Hanakotoba
description:
Hanakotoba 「花言葉」：directly translated from Japanese, hanakotoba means "flower words", but it is much deeper than using flowers to represent words. Hanakotoba is a nuanced language that communicates emotions and feelings.

Dive into Hanakotoba in this interactive flower shop, and learn about the various meanings of flowers and how they can be used to create empathetic bonds between people. 

Controls 

  • WASD to move, mouse to look around. 
  • Press 'E' to read about flowers. 
  • Mouse to click to build flowers. 
  • Press 'esc' at any time to show your cursor. 
  • Press 'R' to restart at any time.
